setup_instructions.instruction: Step 1) Insert capillary tubes into each buckle as shown. Each red lines must be visible.
Step 2) Clasp the buckles so they are secured to the viscometer support.
Step 3) Ensure the sterilization container fluid is above the minimum level marking. Otherwise perform servicing.
Step 4) Ensure the maximum fill line in the waste reservoir is still visible. Otherwise, perform servicing.
Step 5) Place the other sample in the centrifuge slot. Secure the lid of the centrifuge.
Step 6) Place one blood sample in the wholeblood holder. Ensure the lid of the microcentrifuge tube is closed properly.
Step 7) Insert a new pipette tip.
